snippet: Works by Peter Lieberson, an American composer who died in 2011, were explored on Friday at Mannes College’s Beethoven Institute.
lead_paragraph: Works by Peter Lieberson, an American composer who died in 2011, were explored on Friday at Mannes College’s Beethoven Institute.

headline.seo: Beethoven Institute at Mannes College the New School for Music
headline.main: A Contemporary Conversation With Beethoven’s Sonatas
